molecular.statistics.time_series.inefficiency¶

molecular.statistics.time_series.inefficiency(a)[source]¶

Compute the statistical inefficiency \(g\) from the equilibration time au_{eq}.

\[g = 1 + 2 au_{eq}.\]
Parameters

a (numpy.ndarray) –

Returns

Statistical inefficiency.

Return type

float
